hero.title: Expanding Our Battery Solutions Portfolio
hero.tagline: Humble is continuously developing new battery solutions to serve more industries and applications. From specialized systems to enhanced capabilities, we're building the future of portable power.

items.title: Expanded capacity range

items.title: Industry partnerships

items.title: Stay informed

without.title: Traditional product development
without.description: Companies develop products in isolation based on assumptions, release them to market, and hope they meet user needs. Features driven by internal ideas rather than customer reality.

with.title: Humble's approach
with.description: Deploy solutions in real applications. Gather feedback from actual users. Understand specific industry pain points. Develop new solutions based on proven needs. Build with confidence that we're solving real problems.

caseStudy.title: How customer feedback shapes our roadmap
content: Humble started from direct experience with power limitations across multiple industries and applications.
Hundreds of deployments revealed patterns: the need for different capacity options, specialized connectors for different industries, and flexible charging solutions.
Customer feedback drives our development: expanding our capacity range, building industry-specific solutions, and enhancing monitoring capabilities for fleet operations.
caseStudy.quote: We build solutions based on customer reality, not feature checklists. Every new product comes from actual application experience.

items.question: When will new solutions be available?
items.answer: We're continuously developing new battery solutions. Release timing depends on testing and validation. Join our mailing list for announcements.

items.question: Can I provide feedback or solution requests?
items.answer: Absolutely. We actively seek customer feedback to guide development. Contact us with your specific power challenges and requirements.

items.question: Will you offer beta testing or early access?
items.answer: Yes. Customers who provide valuable feedback may receive early access to new solutions and features. Contact Humble to express interest.

items.question: What about international availability?
items.answer: We're currently focused on our primary markets. We're exploring partnerships for broader distribution. Contact us if you're interested in bringing Humble to your region.

items.question: Do you plan solutions for other industries?
items.answer: Yes. While we started in production power, we're expanding to serve emergency services, events, construction, and other industries requiring professional portable power.

finalCta.title: Help shape our roadmap
